:ctwokinds-RainezZz:
That corsair case I'm looking at looks like it'll have decent thermals
When gamer's nexus did a review of the case back in it's original format (non-tempered glass front panel, only 2 fans included)
They tested with a 6700k oc'd to 4.4Ghz with an MSI Core Frozr L as the cpu cooler, they were getting temps ~52 - 57C over ambient.
A bit toasty, but the case had almost no airflow.  Default was 1 intake 1 exhaust.  The temps dropped to 51 - 52 by either removing the front panel or adding an extra fan.
I'm thinking that with 3 intake and 3 exhaust, the thermals should be so much better.

Speaking of Russians, I loved "No Russian" from Modern Warfare <3
Really drove home how evil and calculating Vladimir Makarov was
His checklist for that day was definitely this:
1) Go to airport
2) Murder hundreds of civilians and armed responders
3) Murder the American mole and leave his body at the scene
4) Wait for war between America and Russia
I remember that mission causing a lot of controversy.
I never played the game, so I don't know how it really goes down
How the story treats it
Or how the player thinks about it
The mission is more or less you're part of Makarov's group that shows up at a russian airport armed in kevlar vests with LMGs
The famous line, "Remember... no Russian." is spoken just before opening fire behind a crowd of unwitting civilians
The entire point is to massacre as many people at the airport as possible.
Also, the level plays itself, you don't have to kill a single person if you don't want to.
Fun fact: You don't have to shoot anyone
Hi robit!
o/
